post.Title: I'm going to JavaOne
post.Content:
Well, it turns out that I'm going to be at JavaOne. I'm pretty sure this is New Zealand's proudest moment.

If you are going to be at JavaOne, and you read this blog, then I'd love to catch up! Email me , and let me know when you're available. I'm really looking forward to catching up with everyone, and at the moment I have nothing planned for any of my evenings, and my Saturday 6th June is completely free.
